column4: hi, my webroot is in app/webroot/domainname.com , ive altered .htaccess to make it work, but every link created by html helper have /app/webroot/domainname.com/ before controller and action, anyone knows what i'am missing here?
are you looking for a channel that knows what you mean when you say "html helper"? :P
I would check the relevant bug on bugs.ubuntu.com
